Package stream

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChatController
    Controller of the JavaFX window
    ClientListenThread
    Thread used to listen for incoming messages on the client side
    ClientWriteThread
    Thread that was used to send messages from the client to the server when there was no GUI : listens the stream of the console and send a message to the server
    EchoServerMultiThreaded
    A class that represents the server using multiple threads: one for each connection
    Loader
    Main class for the client that opens the GUI
    MainServer
    Class that creates the server and runs it
    ServerThread
    Class representing a separate thread of the server responsible for the connection with one specific client
